Question: This person's campaign was noted for the simple but effective slogan, "I Like Ike".
Hints: On March 28, 1969, this person died in Washington, D.C.
This person stated prophetically that "this war would absorb our troops by divisions.".
This person met and fell in love with Mamie Geneva Doud of Boone, Iowa, six years his junior, while he was stationed in Texas.
